basics.name: Amaury Grotard
basics.label: Bachelor Student
basics.summary: A Belgian student with a passion for computers and programming.

work.name: EPHEC
work.summary: I've joined my school's I.T department for my bachelor's internship. I've been in for 3 months to discover the work of a system and network administrator. I've been given the opportunity to work with Shibboleth to build an identity provider integrated with eduGAIN. I've also worked with virtual machines using VMWare's suite. The internship was very promising, and I learnt a lot of knowledge in virtualization and single sign-on.

work.name: MINAKEM
work.summary: I completed my sixth grade internship at a pharmaceutical company. It was an observation internship with an I.T helpdesk technician. I learned a lot about how I.T works in a company. This internship was very enriching and helped me confirm the path I wanted to follow.

volunteer.summary: I was an elected student of the EPHEC Student Council, called "CHE2". I acted as administrator and secretary. The members of the EPHEC Student Council are elected annually by their peers and represent all students at EPHEC in the various participatory bodies such as the Board of Management, the Pedagogical Council, the Sector Council and the Social Council.
